attributes.action: Stop Immigration until the country can sustain more incoming people.  And stop paying benefits to any immigrant that has not paid into the system for at least five years.  We cannot afford to keep this happening.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The pockets of the hard working people of this country, including hard working immigrants, are of limited depth, we cannot afford to keep paying for immigrants that wont work.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence - 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/NSImmigration/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
